document.full_text: rory mcilroy smashed the longest drive of his career as he put his u.s. masters meltdown behind him to fire an opening round three-under-par 69 at the malaysian open on thursday.
document.title: booming mcilroy begins well in kl, nervous noren leads
lines_and_colors: rory mcilroy smashed the longest drive of his career as he put his u.s. masters meltdown behind him to fire an opening round three-under-par 69 at the malaysian open on thursday.
